resources.string: App needs to request %s permission to use this function normally
Permission request rejected. App needs to use %s permission. Please go to \"Settings\">\"App management\">\"XzFit\">\"Permission\" to allow related permission to use this function normally
Your account was accessed on another device at %s. If it was not done by you, the password may have been leaked. You are advised to go to App to log in, click Forget Password and change the password

Welcome to XzFit. You can use this App to manage your device and view related exercise and health data. We will strictly abide by relevant laws, regulations and privacy policies to protect your personal information. To provide the most basic services, the App needs to be connected to the internet.
Please make sure WiFi or data network is available
Your consent is required before you continue to use XzFit services.

· Try to restart phone or device

When \"Sedentary Alert\" is enabled, the alert will be on with vibration in the set time. Get up and walk around regularly.
When \"Drink Water Reminder\" is enabled, the reminder will be on with vibration in the set time. Adults are advised to drink 1,500ml-1,700ml water every day.
When \"Medication Reminder\" is enabled, the reminder will be on with vibration in the set time. Timed medication enhances compliance and thus improve therapeutic effect.
When \"Alarm Reminder\" is enabled, the reminder will be on with vibration in the set time.
When \"Event Reminder\" is enabled, the reminder will be on with vibration in the set time.

Calls, call log, contacts, messages, etc.
Click Confirm and vibration and ring will stop
Slide to turn off Notification to stop ring and vibration

Heart rate refers to the number of one\'s heartbeats per minute. In the rest state, an adult\'s normal heart rate is about 60–100 beats per minute. Monitor your heart rate changes with the exercise device. A good habit of exercise strengthens lung function and maintains normal fluctuations of heart rate.
Oxygen saturation is an important parameter of breathing and circulation. The smart device can accurately record your blood oxygen measurement and remind you to be alert to low oxygen events.
Women\'s health function is a tool for managing women\'s menstrual period and helping them record and manage menstrual period data.
We will connect phone and sort out the menstrual data you report to make intelligent menstrual prediction. We will remind you of updates to your menstrual period as your assistant.
Please fill in complete menstrual cycle information

Menstrual period refers to the number of days each menstruation lasts, which is usually 3–7 days. During the period, avoid being tired and eating raw or cold food. The menstrual period is the best time to enlarge breasts and improve memory.

Generally, ovulation occurs around the 14th day before the next menstrual period. The 5 days before and 4 days after the ovulation day plus the ovulation day (10 days in total) form the ovulation period (and fertile period), during which the chance of pregnancy is very high! You must take contraceptive measures if you are not ready to be a mother.

The safe period is related to one\'s longest and shorted cycles and the start date of the menstrual period. The safe period is not 100% safe. Sometimes women\'s ovulation will come earlier or later. In this case, the judgment of the safe period will be invalid. Judging the safe period only helps reduce the chance of pregnancy and cannot be used as a method of contraception.
How long is your menstrual period?
What\'s the interval between the start dates of two menstrual periods?
When did the last menstruation start?

We undertake not to collect the following information to send to external parties, strictly abide by laws and regulations, and respect and protect users\' privacy.

Permission for location enables connection between device and mobile Bluetooth to get weather data and generate exercise track. 

 Permission for notification enables App to display device notifications. 

 Permission for notification access enables device to receive related App notifications and device music control. 

 Permission for files and media enables the user to switch his profile photo, share exercise records, update the device dial or firmware and upgrade the App. 

 Permission for call log ensures display of incoming calls on device. 

 Permission for reading and writing SMS ensures display of SMS on device. 

 Permission for contacts ensures display of names of callers or SMS senders on device.

In your use, this App needs to access, read and send SMS, get call log and access contacts to display the names of callers on the wearable device. \n\n If you refuse to invoke the above permissions, this function cannot be used. But it does not affect your use of basic App functions. You may choose to turn off the above permissions and withdraw your consent at any time via \"Settings\">\"Permission management\".
Keep connection between device and phone. Allow notifications from other apps if convenient. We do not collect any data for any purpose and only displays notifications on the watch.
Why do I need to keep the XzFit APP running in the background?

When using the message alert function, you need to keep XzFit APP running in the background. If incoming calls, SMS and APP notification alerts are not received, it may be due to the following system misuse process, you can refer to the following suggestions to set it up. \n\nNote: If you have third party security software installed in your phone, you also need to add XzFit to its application whitelist.
2. Open the \"Settings\" button in the upper right corner of the page, and turn off \"Battery saver\" and \"Ultra battery saver\" on the \"Settings\" page;
3. Go back to the \"Battery saver and Battery\" page, click \"Battery\" > \"Automated tasks\", and choose to turn off all automatic task scenarios after entering.
1. Open Settings and click on \"Apps\" > \"Manage apps\".
2. locate the XzFit APP and click into it.
3. Click on \"Battery saver\", go to it and select \"No restrictions\".
1. Open Settings and click on \"Apps\" > \"Manage apps\".
2. locate the XzFit APP and click into it.
3. Select \" Autostart\" and turn it on.
1. Open the \"Optimizer\" App on the desktop of your mobile phone, select \"Application Launch Management\" and click on it to enter.

2. Find XzFit, if the switch is off, turn the switch on and then off;If the switch is on, set the switch to off, and in the \"Manual Management\" pop-up window, check the \"Auto-launch\", \"Secondary launch\" and \"Run in background\" boxes and click \"OK\".
If you are unable to set it up as described above, try the following steps.
1. open the system settings of the phone.

3. Find XzFit, if the switch is off, turn the switch on and then off;If the switch is on, set the switch to off, and in the \"Manual Management\" pop-up window, check the \"Auto-launch\", \"Secondary launch\" and \"Run in background\" boxes and click \"OK\".
1. Open the \"Phone Manager\" App on the desktop of your phone and select \"Privacy permissions\".
2. Find \"Startup Manager\" in Privacy permissions and click on it to enter.
3. Find XzFit in the list of programs and turn on the switch
1. Open the \"iManager\" App on your mobile desktop and click on \"App Manager\".
2. Click on \"Permission management\" in the app manager interface.
4. Find XzFit in the Autostart manager and turn on the switch.
1. Open the \"Recently Opened Programs\" page of your phone.
2. Long press the XzFit APP card until the lock icon appears on the right side, click to lock it.
1. Open the \"Recently Opened Programs\" page of your phone.
2. Just pull down the XzFit APP and the lock symbol will appear at the top of the APP.
1. Open the \"Recently Opened Programs\" page of your phone.
2. Click the \":\" at the top of XzFit APP, the lock icon will appear, click to lock it.
1. Open the \"Recently Opened Programs\" page of your phone.
2. Just pull down the XzFit APP and the lock symbol will appear above the APP card.
2. Search for \"Battery optimization\" in the search box.
3. Click into Battery Optimization and select \"All apps\" as the filter in the upper left corner.
4. Find XzFit, select \"Not allowed\" and click OK.
1. Open the settings and click on \"Battery\".
3. locate XzFit and click into it.
4. Turn the allow background activity switch on.
1. Open the phone settings and click on \"Battery\".
2. select \"High background power consumption\" (called \"Background power consumption management\" by Origin OS).
3. Find XzFit and click the Allow button (for Origin OS, find XzFit and select \"High background power usage\")
1. lock the XzFit APP in the Recently Opened Programs page.
2. find Self-boot Management in Security Centre or Phone Settings, then find XzFit and switch it on.
3. add XzFit to its whitelist in the Security Centre or in the phone settings.
4. If you have installed relevant application hibernation tools in your phone, such as Green Guardian and Self-Start Manager, you need to remove XzFit from the list of these hibernation applications.

Once an account is logged out, it cannot be restored.Are you sure to continue?

1.Delete nickname/avatar/gender/height/weight and other health history data

2. Delete steps/sleep/heart rate/weight and other health history data

3. Clear running/cycling/hiking/training history data

4. Clear APP setting data

If you choose to turn on the Google fit switch, you will share XzFit fitness data (which may include steps, distance, calories, height, weight, sleep, etc.) to Google Fit. You can connect or disconnect the sharing at any time in the XzFit APP.
The QR code was not scanned, do you want to continue?

In order to ensure that the message is pushed normally without delay, please click Device->Enable background operation permission on the APP home page in turn, and operate according to the prompts on the page.
Chinese input is not supported temporarily*
Failed to quickly reply, there is no permission to send SMS, go to "Settings" to enable relevant permissions?
1. What is a blood pressure level?

The blood pressure level calibration value is the average value obtained from a large-scale sampling of Chinese people by national authoritative medical institutions. Due to individual physical differences, in order to ensure a more realistic measurement value, please measure the blood pressure after calibration.

For accurate value calibration, the average value of the data measured by the nationally certified blood pressure measuring equipment or the average blood pressure of the physical examination should be used.

Your current health is good. Please refer to the following suggestions to improve physical fitness by combining work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep:
1. Stay up late and participate in more outdoor activities; maintain a positive and optimistic mood. 
2. Avoid fatigue. Don't sit for a long time, move around a lot. 
3. Appropriate exercise, participate in physical exercise within one's ability, cultivate one's own hobbies, and develop the habit of weekly exercise;
 4. The diet should be light. It is recommended to eat 70% to 80% full, and at the same time, eat less animal fat and eat more fresh vegetables and fruits.
The QRS complex represents the point change of the depolarization of the ventricular myocardium。
The P wave represents the potential telephone of atrial muscle depolarization. The morphology is generally pure round in most leads, and may sometimes be mildly notched.
The ST segment is the line segment from the end of the QRS complex to the beginning of the T wave, representing the slow repolarization process of the ventricle.
The T wave represents the potential change in the rapid repolarization of the ventricle.
Please long press to start measurement

Keep your fingers away from the electrodes and wear the device tightly. Dry skin will lead to poor contact of the metal sheet at the bottom of the device. Please moisten the wrist skin by breathing or dipping in water.
The content of the report is for reference only

If you choose to turn on the Strava switch, you will share XzFit fitness data (including steps, distance, calories, etc.) to Strava. You can connect or disconnect the sharing at any time in the XzFit APP.
Access nearby devices (Bluetooth device scan and connect)

In order to facilitate the app to continuously and accurately obtain your motion positioning data in the background, and to ensure the accuracy of the device motion trajectory data, please select the location information permission as \'Always Allow\'.
Press and hold the button on the right side of the list and click the button below to adjust the order of sports
Click \"+\" to add a new world clock
It is detected that your data is not saved, do you want to save and exit?

Stress is based on your hrv (heart rate variability) and other data, and the stress value you are currently under is calculated by an algorithm. Stress detection can help you understand your stress state. When you are under high stress, you can release the stress in time to help your health.

The stress value detection can only be performed when it is in a stationary state for a long time. If it is in a non-stationary or moving state, the device will not be able to perform detection, and the battery life of the device will be reduced.
In a quiet state (except sleep), the device will remind you that the stress value is higher than 80 for a certain period of time
